    Smooth functions between smooth manifolds #

    We define C‚Åø functions between smooth manifolds, as functions which are C‚Åø in charts, and prove basic properties of these notions.

    Main definitions and statements #

    Let M and M' be two smooth manifolds, with respect to model with corners I and I'. Let f : M ‚Üí M'.

    • ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x states that the function f is C‚Åø within the set s around the point x.
    • ContMDiffAt I I' n f x states that the function f is C‚Åø around x.
    • ContMDiffOn I I' n f s states that the function f is C‚Åø on the set s
    • ContMDiff I I' n f states that the function f is C‚Åø.
    • ContMDiffOn.comp gives the invariance of the C‚Åø property under composition
    • contMDiff_iff_contDiff states that, for functions between vector spaces, manifold-smoothness is equivalent to usual smoothness.

    We also give many basic properties of smooth functions between manifolds, following the API of smooth functions between vector spaces.

    Implementation details #

    Many properties follow for free from the corresponding properties of functions in vector spaces, as being C‚Åø is a local property invariant under the smooth groupoid. We take advantage of the general machinery developed in local_invariant_properties.lean to get these properties automatically. For instance, the fact that being C‚Åø does not depend on the chart one considers is given by lift_prop_within_at_indep_chart.

    For this to work, the definition of ContMDiffWithinAt and friends has to follow definitionally the setup of local invariant properties. Still, we recast the definition in terms of extended charts in contMDiffOn_iff and contMDiff_iff.

    Definition of smooth functions between manifolds #

    source
    def ContDiffWithinAtProp {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {E' : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') (n : ‚Ñï‚àû) (f : H ‚Üí H') (s : Set H) (x : H) :
    Prop

    Property in the model space of a model with corners of being C^n within at set at a point, when read in the model vector space. This property will be lifted to manifolds to define smooth functions between manifolds.

    Equations
    • ContDiffWithinAtProp I I' n f s x = ContDiffWithinAt ùïú n (‚ÜëI' ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(ModelWithCorners.symm I)) (‚Üë(ModelWithCorners.symm I) ‚Åª¬π' s ‚à© Set.range ‚ÜëI) (‚ÜëI x)
    Instances For

      ContDiffWithinAtProp (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú E) I' n f s x ‚Üî ContDiffWithinAt ùïú n (‚ÜëI' ‚àò f) s x

      source
      theorem contDiffWithinAt_localInvariantProp {ùïú : Type u_3} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') (n : ‚Ñï‚àû) :
      StructureGroupoid.LocalInvariantProp (contDiffGroupoid ‚ä§ I) (contDiffGroupoid ‚ä§ I') (ContDiffWithinAtProp I I' n)

      Being C‚Åø in the model space is a local property, invariant under smooth maps. Therefore, it will lift nicely to manifolds.

      source
      theorem contDiffWithinAtProp_mono_of_mem {ùïú : Type u_2} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_3} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {E' : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') (n : ‚Ñï‚àû) ‚¶És : Set H‚¶Ñ ‚¶Éx : H‚¶Ñ ‚¶Ét : Set H‚¶Ñ ‚¶Éf : H ‚Üí H'‚¶Ñ (hts : s ‚àà nhdsWithin x t) (h : ContDiffWithinAtProp I I' n f s x) :
      ContDiffWithinAtProp I I' n f t x
      source
      theorem contDiffWithinAtProp_id {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} (x : H) :
      ContDiffWithinAtProp I I n id Set.univ x
      source
      def ContMDiffWithinAt {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] (n : ‚Ñï‚àû) (f : M ‚Üí M') (s : Set M) (x : M) :
      Prop

      A function is n times continuously differentiable within a set at a point in a manifold if it is continuous and it is n times continuously differentiable in this set around this point, when read in the preferred chart at this point.

      Equations
      • ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x = ChartedSpace.LiftPropWithinAt (ContDiffWithinAtProp I I' n) f s x
      Instances For
        source
        def SmoothWithinAt {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] (f : M ‚Üí M') (s : Set M) (x : M) :
        Prop

        Abbreviation for ContMDiffWithinAt I I' ‚ä§ f s x. See also documentation for Smooth.

        Equations
        • SmoothWithinAt I I' f s x = ContMDiffWithinAt I I' ‚ä§ f s x

          def ContMDiffAt {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] (n : ‚Ñï‚àû) (f : M ‚Üí M') (x : M) :
          Prop

          A function is n times continuously differentiable at a point in a manifold if it is continuous and it is n times continuously differentiable around this point, when read in the preferred chart at this point.

          Equations
          • ContMDiffAt I I' n f x = ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f Set.univ x

            theorem contMDiffAt_iff {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {f : M ‚Üí M'} {x : M} :
            ContMDiffAt I I' n f x ‚Üî ContinuousAt f x ‚àß ContDiffWithinAt ùïú n (‚Üë(extChartAt I' (f x)) ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x))) (Set.range ‚ÜëI) (‚Üë(extChartAt I x) x)

            def SmoothAt {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] (f : M ‚Üí M') (x : M) :
            Prop

            Abbreviation for ContMDiffAt I I' ‚ä§ f x. See also documentation for Smooth.

            Equations
            • SmoothAt I I' f x = ContMDiffAt I I' ‚ä§ f x
            Instances For
              source
              def ContMDiffOn {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] (n : ‚Ñï‚àû) (f : M ‚Üí M') (s : Set M) :
              Prop

              A function is n times continuously differentiable in a set of a manifold if it is continuous and, for any pair of points, it is n times continuously differentiable on this set in the charts around these points.

              Equations
              • ContMDiffOn I I' n f s = ‚àÄ (x : M), x ‚àà s ‚Üí ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x
              Instances For

                def SmoothOn {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] (f : M ‚Üí M') (s : Set M) :

                Equations
                • SmoothOn I I' f s = ContMDiffOn I I' ‚ä§ f s
                Instances For
                  source
                  def ContMDiff {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] (n : ‚Ñï‚àû) (f : M ‚Üí M') :
                  Prop

                  A function is n times continuously differentiable in a manifold if it is continuous and, for any pair of points, it is n times continuously differentiable in the charts around these points.

                  Equations
                  • ContMDiff I I' n f = ‚àÄ (x : M), ContMDiffAt I I' n f x
                  Instances For
                    source
                    def Smooth {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H) {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H') {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] (f : M ‚Üí M') :
                    Prop

                    Abbreviation for ContMDiff I I' ‚ä§ f. Short note to work with these abbreviations: a lemma of the form cont_mdiff_foo.bar will apply fine to an assumption smooth_foo using dot notation or normal notation. If the consequence bar of the lemma involves ContDiff, it is still better to restate the lemma replacing ContDiff with Smooth both in the assumption and in the conclusion, to make it possible to use Smooth consistently. This also applies to SmoothAt, SmoothOn and SmoothWithinAt.

                    Equations
                    • Smooth I I' f = ContMDiff I I' ‚ä§ f
                    Instances For

                      Basic properties of smooth functions between manifolds #

                      source
                      theorem ContMDiff.smooth {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} (h : ContMDiff I I' ‚ä§ f) :
                      Smooth I I' f

                      theorem contMDiffWithinAt_iff {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x ‚Üî ContinuousWithinAt f s x ‚àß ContDiffWithinAt ùïú n (‚Üë(extChartAt I' (f x)) ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x))) (‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x)) ‚Åª¬π' s ‚à© Set.range ‚ÜëI) (‚Üë(extChartAt I x) x)

                      One can reformulate smoothness within a set at a point as continuity within this set at this point, and smoothness in the corresponding extended chart.

                      source
                      theorem contMDiffWithinAt_iff' {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x ‚Üî ContinuousWithinAt f s x ‚àß ContDiffWithinAt ùïú n (‚Üë(extChartAt I' (f x)) ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x))) ((extChartAt I x).target ‚à© ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x)) ‚Åª¬π' (s ‚à© f ‚Åª¬π' (extChartAt I' (f x)).source)) (‚Üë(extChartAt I x) x)

                      One can reformulate smoothness within a set at a point as continuity within this set at this point, and smoothness in the corresponding extended chart. This form states smoothness of f written in such a way that the set is restricted to lie within the domain/codomain of the corresponding charts. Even though this expression is more complicated than the one in contMDiffWithinAt_iff, it is a smaller set, but their germs at extChartAt I x x are equal. It is sometimes useful to rewrite using this in the goal.

                      source
                      theorem contMDiffWithinAt_iff_target {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x ‚Üî ContinuousWithinAt f s x ‚àß ContMDiffWithinAt I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú E') n (‚Üë(extChartAt I' (f x)) ‚àò f) s x

                      One can reformulate smoothness within a set at a point as continuity within this set at this point, and smoothness in the corresponding extended chart in the target.

                      source
                      theorem smoothWithinAt_iff {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {x : M} :

                      theorem contMDiffWithinAt_iff_of_mem_maximalAtlas {ùïú : Type u_3} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_7} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {e : LocalHomeomorph M H} {e' : LocalHomeomorph M' H'} {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {x : M} (he : e ‚àà SmoothManifoldWithCorners.maximalAtlas I M) (he' : e' ‚àà SmoothManifoldWithCorners.maximalAtlas I' M') (hx : x ‚àà e.source) (hy : f x ‚àà e'.source) :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x ‚Üî ContinuousWithinAt f s x ‚àß ContDiffWithinAt ùïú n (‚Üë(LocalHomeomorph.extend e' I') ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (LocalHomeomorph.extend e I))) (‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (LocalHomeomorph.extend e I)) ‚Åª¬π' s ‚à© Set.range ‚ÜëI) (‚Üë(LocalHomeomorph.extend e I) x)
                      source
                      theorem contMDiffWithinAt_iff_image {ùïú : Type u_3} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_7} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {e : LocalHomeomorph M H} {e' : LocalHomeomorph M' H'} {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {x : M} (he : e ‚àà SmoothManifoldWithCorners.maximalAtlas I M) (he' : e' ‚àà SmoothManifoldWithCorners.maximalAtlas I' M') (hs : s ‚äÜ e.source) (hx : x ‚àà e.source) (hy : f x ‚àà e'.source) :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x ‚Üî ContinuousWithinAt f s x ‚àß ContDiffWithinAt ùïú n (‚Üë(LocalHomeomorph.extend e' I') ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (LocalHomeomorph.extend e I))) (‚Üë(LocalHomeomorph.extend e I) '' s) (‚Üë(LocalHomeomorph.extend e I) x)

                      An alternative formulation of contMDiffWithinAt_iff_of_mem_maximalAtlas if the set if s lies in e.source.

                      source
                      theorem contMDiffWithinAt_iff_of_mem_source {ùïú : Type u_5} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_6} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_7} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {x' : M} {y : M'} (hx : x' ‚àà (chartAt H x).toLocalEquiv.source) (hy : f x' ‚àà (chartAt H' y).toLocalEquiv.source) :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x' ‚Üî ContinuousWithinAt f s x' ‚àß ContDiffWithinAt ùïú n (‚Üë(extChartAt I' y) ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x))) (‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x)) ‚Åª¬π' s ‚à© Set.range ‚ÜëI) (‚Üë(extChartAt I x) x')

                      One can reformulate smoothness within a set at a point as continuity within this set at this point, and smoothness in any chart containing that point.

                      source
                      theorem contMDiffWithinAt_iff_of_mem_source' {ùïú : Type u_5} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_6} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_7} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {x' : M} {y : M'} (hx : x' ‚àà (chartAt H x).toLocalEquiv.source) (hy : f x' ‚àà (chartAt H' y).toLocalEquiv.source) :

                      theorem contMDiffOn_iff_of_subset_source {ùïú : Type u_5} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_6} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_7} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {x : M} {y : M'} (hs : s ‚äÜ (chartAt H x).toLocalEquiv.source) (h2s : Set.MapsTo f s (chartAt H' y).toLocalEquiv.source) :
                      ContMDiffOn I I' n f s ‚Üî ContinuousOn f s ‚àß ContDiffOn ùïú n (‚Üë(extChartAt I' y) ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x))) (‚Üë(extChartAt I x) '' s)

                      If the set where you want f to be smooth lies entirely in a single chart, and f maps it into a single chart, the smoothness of f on that set can be expressed by purely looking in these charts. Note: this lemma uses extChartAt I x '' s instead of (extChartAt I x).symm ‚Åª¬π' s to ensure that this set lies in (extChartAt I x).target.

                      source

                      theorem contMDiffOn_iff {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} :
                      ContMDiffOn I I' n f s ‚Üî ContinuousOn f s ‚àß ‚àÄ (x : M) (y : M'), ContDiffOn ùïú n (‚Üë(extChartAt I' y) ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x))) ((extChartAt I x).target ‚à© ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x)) ‚Åª¬π' (s ‚à© f ‚Åª¬π' (extChartAt I' y).source))

                      One can reformulate smoothness on a set as continuity on this set, and smoothness in any extended chart.

                      theorem contMDiffOn_iff_target {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} :

                      One can reformulate smoothness on a set as continuity on this set, and smoothness in any extended chart in the target.

                      theorem smoothOn_iff {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} :
                      SmoothOn I I' f s ‚Üî ContinuousOn f s ‚àß ‚àÄ (x : M) (y : M'), ContDiffOn ùïú ‚ä§ (‚Üë(extChartAt I' y) ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x))) ((extChartAt I x).target ‚à© ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x)) ‚Åª¬π' (s ‚à© f ‚Åª¬π' (extChartAt I' y).source))

                      theorem contMDiff_iff {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} :
                      ContMDiff I I' n f ‚Üî Continuous f ‚àß ‚àÄ (x : M) (y : M'), ContDiffOn ùïú n (‚Üë(extChartAt I' y) ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x))) ((extChartAt I x).target ‚à© ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x)) ‚Åª¬π' (f ‚Åª¬π' (extChartAt I' y).source))

                      One can reformulate smoothness as continuity and smoothness in any extended chart.

                      source
                      theorem contMDiff_iff_target {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} :
                      ContMDiff I I' n f ‚Üî Continuous f ‚àß ‚àÄ (y : M'), ContMDiffOn I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú E') n (‚Üë(extChartAt I' y) ‚àò f) (f ‚Åª¬π' (extChartAt I' y).source)

                      One can reformulate smoothness as continuity and smoothness in any extended chart in the target.

                      source
                      theorem smooth_iff {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} :
                      Smooth I I' f ‚Üî Continuous f ‚àß ‚àÄ (x : M) (y : M'), ContDiffOn ùïú ‚ä§ (‚Üë(extChartAt I' y) ‚àò f ‚àò ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x))) ((extChartAt I x).target ‚à© ‚Üë(LocalEquiv.symm (extChartAt I x)) ‚Åª¬π' (f ‚Åª¬π' (extChartAt I' y).source))
                      source
                      theorem smooth_iff_target {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} :

                      theorem contMDiffWithinAt_iff_contMDiffOn_nhds {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï} :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I' (‚Üën) f s x ‚Üî ‚àÉ u, u ‚àà nhdsWithin x (insert x s) ‚àß ContMDiffOn I I' (‚Üën) f u

                      A function is C^n within a set at a point, for n : ‚Ñï, if and only if it is C^n on a neighborhood of this point.

                      source
                      theorem contMDiffAt_iff_contMDiffOn_nhds {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï} :
                      ContMDiffAt I I' (‚Üën) f x ‚Üî ‚àÉ u, u ‚àà nhds x ‚àß ContMDiffOn I I' (‚Üën) f u

                      A function is C^n at a point, for n : ‚Ñï, if and only if it is C^n on a neighborhood of this point.

                      source
                      theorem contMDiffAt_iff_contMDiffAt_nhds {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï} :
                      ContMDiffAt I I' (‚Üën) f x ‚Üî ‚àÄ·∂† (x' : M) in nhds x, ContMDiffAt I I' (‚Üën) f x'

                      Note: This does not hold for n = ‚àû. f being C^‚àû at x means that for every n, f is C^n on some neighborhood of x, but this neighborhood can depend on n.

                      Congruence lemmas #

                      Locality #

                      theorem contMDiffOn_of_locally_contMDiffOn {ùïú : Type u_2} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_3} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} (h : ‚àÄ (x : M), x ‚àà s ‚Üí ‚àÉ u, IsOpen u ‚àß x ‚àà u ‚àß ContMDiffOn I I' n f (s ‚à© u)) :

                      Smoothness of the composition of smooth functions between manifolds #

                      source
                      theorem ContMDiffWithinAt.comp {ùïú : Type u_2} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_3} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {E'' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E''] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E''] {H'' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H''] {I'' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E'' H''} {M'' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M''] [inst : ChartedSpace H'' M''] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {t : Set M'} {g : M' ‚Üí M''} (x : M) (hg : ContMDiffWithinAt I' I'' n g t (f x)) (hf : ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x) (st : Set.MapsTo f s t) :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I'' n (g ‚àò f) s x

                      The composition of C^n functions within domains at points is C^n.

                      source
                      theorem ContMDiffWithinAt.comp_of_eq {ùïú : Type u_2} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_3} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {E'' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E''] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E''] {H'' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H''] {I'' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E'' H''} {M'' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M''] [inst : ChartedSpace H'' M''] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {t : Set M'} {g : M' ‚Üí M''} {x : M} {y : M'} (hg : ContMDiffWithinAt I' I'' n g t y) (hf : ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x) (st : Set.MapsTo f s t) (hx : f x = y) :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I'' n (g ‚àò f) s x

                      See note [comp_of_eq lemmas]

                      theorem SmoothWithinAt.comp {ùïú : Type u_2} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_3} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {E'' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E''] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E''] {H'' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H''] {I'' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E'' H''} {M'' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M''] [inst : ChartedSpace H'' M''] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {t : Set M'} {g : M' ‚Üí M''} (x : M) (hg : SmoothWithinAt I' I'' g t (f x)) (hf : SmoothWithinAt I I' f s x) (st : Set.MapsTo f s t) :

                      The composition of C^‚àû functions within domains at points is C^‚àû.

                      theorem ContMDiffOn.comp {ùïú : Type u_2} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_3} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {E'' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E''] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E''] {H'' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H''] {I'' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E'' H''} {M'' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M''] [inst : ChartedSpace H'' M''] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {t : Set M'} {g : M' ‚Üí M''} (hg : ContMDiffOn I' I'' n g t) (hf : ContMDiffOn I I' n f s) (st : s ‚äÜ f ‚Åª¬π' t) :
                      ContMDiffOn I I'' n (g ‚àò f) s

                      The composition of C^n functions on domains is C^n.

                      theorem ContMDiffAt.comp_contMDiffWithinAt {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {E'' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E''] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E''] {H'' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H''] {I'' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E'' H''} {M'' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M''] [inst : ChartedSpace H'' M''] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {g : M' ‚Üí M''} (x : M) (hg : ContMDiffAt I' I'' n g (f x)) (hf : ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x) :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I I'' n (g ‚àò f) s x

                      g ‚àò f is C^n within s at x if g is C^n at f x and f is C^n within s at x.

                      source
                      theorem SmoothAt.comp_smoothWithinAt {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {E'' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E''] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E''] {H'' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H''] {I'' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E'' H''} {M'' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M''] [inst : ChartedSpace H'' M''] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {g : M' ‚Üí M''} (x : M) (hg : SmoothAt I' I'' g (f x)) (hf : SmoothWithinAt I I' f s x) :
                      SmoothWithinAt I I'' (g ‚àò f) s x

                      g ‚àò f is C^‚àû within s at x if g is C^‚àû at f x and f is C^‚àû within s at x.

                      theorem ContMDiff.comp_contMDiffOn {ùïú : Type u_2} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_9} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_3} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {E'' : Type u_6} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E''] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E''] {H'' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace H''] {I'' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E'' H''} {M'' : Type u_8} [inst : TopologicalSpace M''] [inst : ChartedSpace H'' M''] {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {f : M ‚Üí M'} {g : M' ‚Üí M''} {s : Set M} (hg : ContMDiff I' I'' n g) (hf : ContMDiffOn I I' n f s) :
                      ContMDiffOn I I'' n (g ‚àò f) s
                      source
                      theorem Smooth.comp_smoothOn {ùïú : Type u_2} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_9} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_3} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {E'' : Type u_6} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E''] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E''] {H'' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace H''] {I'' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E'' H''} {M'' : Type u_8} [inst : TopologicalSpace M''] [inst : ChartedSpace H'' M''] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {g : M' ‚Üí M''} {s : Set M} (hg : Smooth I' I'' g) (hf : SmoothOn I I' f s) :
                      SmoothOn I I'' (g ‚àò f) s
                      source

                      Smoothness of standard maps associated to the product of manifolds #

                      theorem ContMDiffWithinAt.prod_mk {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {F' : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup F'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú F'] {G' : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace G'] {J' : ModelWithCorners ùïú F' G'} {N' : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace N'] [inst : ChartedSpace G' N'] {s : Set M} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {f : M ‚Üí M'} {g : M ‚Üí N'} (hf : ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s x) (hg : ContMDiffWithinAt I J' n g s x) :

                      theorem smoothAt_fst {ùïú : Type u_3} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {F : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup F] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú F] {G : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace G] {J : ModelWithCorners ùïú F G} {N : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace N] [inst : ChartedSpace G N] {p : M √ó N} :

                      theorem contMDiffWithinAt_prod_iff {ùïú : Type u_4} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_7} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {F' : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup F'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú F'] {G' : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace G'] {J' : ModelWithCorners ùïú F' G'} {N' : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace N'] [inst : ChartedSpace G' N'] {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} (f : M ‚Üí M' √ó N') {s : Set M} {x : M} :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I (ModelWithCorners.prod I' J') n f s x ‚Üî ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n (Prod.fst ‚àò f) s x ‚àß ContMDiffWithinAt I J' n (Prod.snd ‚àò f) s x
                      source
                      theorem contMDiffAt_prod_iff {ùïú : Type u_3} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_7} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {F' : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup F'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú F'] {G' : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace G'] {J' : ModelWithCorners ùïú F' G'} {N' : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace N'] [inst : ChartedSpace G' N'] {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} (f : M ‚Üí M' √ó N') {x : M} :
                      ContMDiffAt I (ModelWithCorners.prod I' J') n f x ‚Üî ContMDiffAt I I' n (Prod.fst ‚àò f) x ‚àß ContMDiffAt I J' n (Prod.snd ‚àò f) x
                      source

                      source
                      theorem smoothAt_prod_iff {ùïú : Type u_3} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_7} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {F' : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup F'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú F'] {G' : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace G'] {J' : ModelWithCorners ùïú F' G'} {N' : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace N'] [inst : ChartedSpace G' N'] (f : M ‚Üí M' √ó N') {x : M} :
                      SmoothAt I (ModelWithCorners.prod I' J') f x ‚Üî SmoothAt I I' (Prod.fst ‚àò f) x ‚àß SmoothAt I J' (Prod.snd ‚àò f) x
                      source
                      theorem smooth_prod_iff {ùïú : Type u_3} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_7} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {F' : Type u_8} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup F'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú F'] {G' : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace G'] {J' : ModelWithCorners ùïú F' G'} {N' : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace N'] [inst : ChartedSpace G' N'] (f : M ‚Üí M' √ó N') :
                      Smooth I (ModelWithCorners.prod I' J') f ‚Üî Smooth I I' (Prod.fst ‚àò f) ‚àß Smooth I J' (Prod.snd ‚àò f)
                      source
                      theorem smooth_prod_assoc {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_8} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_3} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_6} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_9} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {F : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup F] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú F] {G : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace G] {J : ModelWithCorners ùïú F G} {N : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace N] [inst : ChartedSpace G N] :

                      theorem ContMDiffWithinAt.prod_map' {ùïú : Type u_3} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_4} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_5} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {E' : Type u_6} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E'] {H' : Type u_7} [inst : TopologicalSpace H'] {I' : ModelWithCorners ùïú E' H'} {M' : Type u_8} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H' M'] {F : Type u_9} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup F] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú F] {G : Type u_10} [inst : TopologicalSpace G] {J : ModelWithCorners ùïú F G} {N : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace N] [inst : ChartedSpace G N] {F' : Type u_11} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup F'] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú F'] {G' : Type u_12} [inst : TopologicalSpace G'] {J' : ModelWithCorners ùïú F' G'} {N' : Type u_13} [inst : TopologicalSpace N'] [inst : ChartedSpace G' N'] {f : M ‚Üí M'} {s : Set M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {g : N ‚Üí N'} {r : Set N} {p : M √ó N} (hf : ContMDiffWithinAt I I' n f s p.fst) (hg : ContMDiffWithinAt J J' n g r p.snd) :

                      The product map of two C^n functions within a set at a point is C^n within the product set at the product point.

                      Smoothness of functions with codomain Œ† i, F i #

                      We have no ModelWithCorners.pi yet, so we prove lemmas about functions f : M ‚Üí Œ† i, F i and use ùìò(ùïú, Œ† i, F i) as the model space.

                      theorem smoothAt_pi_space {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {x : M} {Œπ : Type u_5} [inst : Fintype Œπ] {Fi : Œπ ‚Üí Type u_6} [inst : (i : Œπ) ‚Üí NormedAddCommGroup (Fi i)] [inst : (i : Œπ) ‚Üí NormedSpace ùïú (Fi i)] {œÜ : M ‚Üí (i : Œπ) ‚Üí Fi i} :

                      theorem smooth_pi_space {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {Œπ : Type u_5} [inst : Fintype Œπ] {Fi : Œπ ‚Üí Type u_6} [inst : (i : Œπ) ‚Üí NormedAddCommGroup (Fi i)] [inst : (i : Œπ) ‚Üí NormedSpace ùïú (Fi i)] {œÜ : M ‚Üí (i : Œπ) ‚Üí Fi i} :

                      Smoothness of standard operations #

                      source
                      theorem smooth_smul {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {V : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú V] :
                      Smooth (ModelWithCorners.prod (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú ùïú) (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú V)) (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú V) fun p => p.fst ‚Ä¢ p.snd

                      On any vector space, multiplication by a scalar is a smooth operation.

                      source
                      theorem ContMDiffWithinAt.smul {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {s : Set M} {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {V : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú V] {f : M ‚Üí ùïú} {g : M ‚Üí V} (hf : ContMDiffWithinAt I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú ùïú) n f s x) (hg : ContMDiffWithinAt I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú V) n g s x) :
                      ContMDiffWithinAt I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú V) n (fun p => f p ‚Ä¢ g p) s x
                      source
                      theorem ContMDiffAt.smul {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {x : M} {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} {V : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú V] {f : M ‚Üí ùïú} {g : M ‚Üí V} (hf : ContMDiffAt I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú ùïú) n f x) (hg : ContMDiffAt I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú V) n g x) :
                      ContMDiffAt I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú V) n (fun p => f p ‚Ä¢ g p) x
                      source

                      theorem Smooth.smul {ùïú : Type u_1} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_2} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_4} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] {V : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup V] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú V] {f : M ‚Üí ùïú} {g : M ‚Üí V} (hf : Smooth I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú ùïú) f) (hg : Smooth I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú V) g) :
                      Smooth I (modelWithCornersSelf ùïú V) fun p => f p ‚Ä¢ g p

                      Smoothness of (local) structomorphisms #

                      source
                      theorem isLocalStructomorphOn_contDiffGroupoid_iff_aux {ùïú : Type u_4} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {M' : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H M'] [IsM' : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M'] {f : LocalHomeomorph M M'} (hf : ChartedSpace.LiftPropOn (StructureGroupoid.IsLocalStructomorphWithinAt (contDiffGroupoid ‚ä§ I)) (‚Üëf) f.source) :
                      SmoothOn I I (‚Üëf) f.source
                      source
                      theorem isLocalStructomorphOn_contDiffGroupoid_iff {ùïú : Type u_4} [inst : NontriviallyNormedField ùïú] {E : Type u_5} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : NormedSpace ùïú E] {H : Type u_3} [inst : TopologicalSpace H] {I : ModelWithCorners ùïú E H} {M : Type u_1} [inst : TopologicalSpace M] [inst : ChartedSpace H M] [inst : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M] {M' : Type u_2} [inst : TopologicalSpace M'] [inst : ChartedSpace H M'] [IsM' : SmoothManifoldWithCorners I M'] (f : LocalHomeomorph M M') :
                      ChartedSpace.LiftPropOn (StructureGroupoid.IsLocalStructomorphWithinAt (contDiffGroupoid ‚ä§ I)) (‚Üëf) f.source ‚Üî SmoothOn I I (‚Üëf) f.source ‚àß SmoothOn I I (‚Üë(LocalHomeomorph.symm f)) f.target

                      Let M and M' be smooth manifolds with the same model-with-corners, I. Then f : M ‚Üí M' is a local structomorphism for I, if and only if it is manifold-smooth on the domain of definition in both directions.
